pieces

Class Pieces

  • java.lang.Object
    • pieces.Pieces
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Pieces
extends java.lang.Object

      • isOutOfBounds

        public boolean isOutOfBounds(Position np,
                             Board board)
        Checks if piece is leaving confines of the board.
        Parameters:
        np - new position
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        true if in bounds

      • isValid

        public abstract boolean isValid(Position np,
                                Board board)
        Abstract method that depends on the piece. Each piece has their own method of moving and this method checks if their projected move is valid.
        Parameters:
        np - new position
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        returns true if can make valid move to position

      • move

        public abstract boolean move(Position np,
                             Board board)
        Moves piece from current position to new position.
        Parameters:
        np - new position
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        true if move is successful

      • canMoveThrough

        public boolean canMoveThrough(Position np,
                              Board board)
        Method that returns true if positions between the current piece's position and its desired position are empty, false otherwise. Returns true for knight piece as it can jump over anything.
        Parameters:
        np - New position
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        true if piece may move through the positions

      • isTeammate

        public boolean isTeammate(Position np,
                          Board board)
        Method that returns false if the destination spot has a teammate, as a piece may not take a teammate.
        Parameters:
        np - new position to check
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        true if position is enemy piece or empty

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString method override from object class. Prints out the first letter of the class's color and then first letter of name (which is why Knight's name is Night).
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • testPosition

        public boolean testPosition(Pieces piece,
                            Position np,
                            Board board)
        Method that tests if a move puts king into check with a dummy board.
        Parameters:
        piece - piece that is making move
        np - position piece wants to move to
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        true if position does not put king into check
